name: Coinbase My Address Getter
description: Tool for getting the default address of a Coinbase wallet
author: Shinkai

name.description: Identifier name for the Coinbase wallet to retrieve address from

privateKey.description: Private key for wallet authentication. Must be a valid hex string

walletId.description: Specific wallet ID to get address for. If not provided, uses default wallet

useServerSigner.description: Enable server-side signing for transactions. Set to 'true' or 'false'

walletId.description: Override wallet ID from configuration. If provided, takes precedence over config walletId

address.description: The Ethereum address of the Coinbase wallet
